#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN
#define xx first
#define yy second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
typedef vector<ll> vll;
 
int main()
{
	int N,U;
	cin>>N>>U;
	int S = sqrt(N);
	vector<int> A(N+1);
	vector<pii> q;
	
	//Online part solving for a >= sqrt(N)
	for(int i = 0; i < U; i++)
	{
		int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(a >= S)
		{
			for(int j = b; j <= N; j += a)
				A[j]++;
		}
		else
		{
			q.push_back(make_pair(a,b));
		}
	}
	//Offline part for a < sqrt(N)
	sort(q.begin(),q.end());
	int pos = 0;	//marks the position of next query to be considered
	for(int a = 1; a < S; a++)
	{
		vector<int> cnt(N,0);
		int im = 1;	//represents i%a
		for(int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
		{
			//Increment cnt[b%a] for all queries with same 'a' value and 'b' <= i
			while(pos < q.size() && q[pos].first == a && q[pos].second <= i)
			{
				cnt[q[pos].second%a]++;
				pos++;
			}
			if(im >= a)	im -= a;
			A[i] += cnt[im];
			im++;
		}
		
	}
	for(int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
		cout<<A[i]<<" ";
	cout<<endl;
	return 0;
}
